question_pt: Quais são os anos disponíveis nos dados?
question_en: Which years are available in the data?
query: SELECT DISTINCT year FROM time

question_pt: Quais são os meses registrados?
question_en: Which months are recorded?
query: SELECT DISTINCT month FROM time

question_pt: Quantos registros existem na tabela de despesas?
question_en: How many records are there in the expenses table?
query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM expense_fact

question_pt: Quais são os poderes registrados?
question_en: Which government branches are registered?
query: SELECT DISTINCT pb.power_name FROM expense_fact ef LEFT JOIN power_branch pb  ON ef.power_code = pb.power_code

question_pt: Quais são as funções de despesa distintas listadas?
question_en: What are the listed expense functions?
query: SELECT DISTINCT f.function_name FROM expense_fact ef LEFT JOIN function f ON ef.function_code = f.function_code

question_pt: Quais são os órgãos disponíveis?
question_en: Which departments are available?
query: SELECT DISTINCT a.agency_name FROM expense_fact ef LEFT JOIN agency a ON ef.agency_code = a.agency_code

question_pt: Quais são os códigos de unidade gestora distintos?
question_en: What are the managing unit codes?
query: SELECT DISTINCT management_code FROM expense_fact ef

question_pt: Liste todas as fontes de recurso distintas.
question_en: List all distinct resource sources.
query: SELECT DISTINCT fs.source_name FROM expense_fact ef LEFT JOIN funding_source fs ON ef.source_code = fs.source_code

question_pt: Quantos credores estão registrados?
question_en: How many creditors are registered?
query: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT creditor_code) FROM expense_fact

question_pt: Quais são as programas presentes?
question_en: What are the present programs?
query: SELECT DISTINCT p.program_name FROM expense_fact ef LEFT JOIN program p ON ef.program_code = p.program_code

question_pt: Qual é o valor total empenhado?
question_en: What is the total committed amount?
query: SELECT SUM(committed_value) FROM expense_fact

question_pt: Qual é o valor médio pago?
question_en: What is the average amount paid?
query: SELECT AVG(paid_budget_value) FROM expense_fact

question_pt: Qual é o maior valor liquidado?
question_en: What is the highest settled value?
query: SELECT MAX(settled_value) FROM expense_fact

question_pt: Qual é o menor valor de dotação inicial?
question_en: What is the lowest initial allocation value?
query: SELECT MIN(initial_budget_value) FROM expense_fact

question_pt: Quantos tipos de fonte existem?
question_en: How many types of sources are there?
query: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT fs.source_name) FROM expense_fact ef LEFT JOIN funding_source fs ON ef.source_code = fs.source_code

question_pt: Qual é a soma total da dotação atualizada?
question_en: What is the total of updated allocation?
query: SELECT SUM(updated_budget_value) FROM expense_fact

question_pt: Qual é a média do valor empenhado por mês?
question_en: What is the average committed value per month?
query: SELECT t.month, AVG(ef.committed_value) FROM expense_fact ef LEFT JOIN time t ON ef.time_id = t.id GROUP BY t.month

question_pt: Qual é o total de pagamentos por função?
question_en: What is the total payment by function?
query: SELECT function_code, SUM(paid_budget_value) FROM expense_fact GROUP BY function_code

question_pt: Qual é o valor médio liquidado por poder?
question_en: What is the average settled value by government branch?
query: SELECT pb.power_name, AVG(ef.settled_value) FROM expense_fact ef LEFT JOIN power_branch pb ON ef.power_code = pb.power_code GROUP BY pb.power_code

question_pt: Qual foi o valor pago em 2025?
question_en: What was the amount paid in 2025?
query: SELECT SUM(ef.paid_budget_value) FROM expense_fact ef LEFT JOIN time t ON ef.time_id = t.id WHERE t.year = 2025

question_pt: Qual o total liquidado para o credor código 415045?
question_en: What is the settled total for code 415045?
query: SELECT SUM(settled_value) FROM expense_fact WHERE creditor_code = 415045

question_pt: Selecione todos os registros do 2º trimestre de 2025.
question_en: Select all records from the 2nd trimester of 2025.
query: SELECT t.trimester, AVG(ef.settled_value) FROM expense_fact ef LEFT JOIN time t ON ef.time_id = t.id WHERE t.trimester  = '2º Trimestre' GROUP BY t.trimester

question_pt: Qual é o total empenhado para o código de ação 1070?
question_en: What is the total committed for action code 1070?
query: SELECT SUM(committed_value) FROM expense_fact WHERE action_code = 1070

question_pt: Quais são as despesas emergenciais registradas?
question_en: Which emergency expenses are registered?
query: SELECT * FROM expense_fact WHERE emergency_indicator = 0

question_pt: Quais são os registros com fonte recurso 'Fonte Tesouro'?
question_en: What are the records with source 'Fonte Tesouro'?
query: SELECT * FROM expense_fact ef LEFT JOIN funding_source fs ON ef.source_code = fs.source_code WHERE fs.source_name LIKE '%Fonte Tesouro%'

question_pt: Qual é o valor total liquidado no 1º quadrimestre?
question_en: What is the total settled in the 1st four-month period?
query: SELECT t.quadrimester, AVG(ef.settled_value) FROM expense_fact ef LEFT JOIN time t ON ef.time_id = t.id WHERE t.quadrimester = '1º Quadrimestre' GROUP BY t.quadrimester

question_pt: Quais são os registros de 2025 para a unidade gestora 160085?
question_en: What are the 2025 records for managing unit 160085?
query: SELECT * FROM expense_fact ef LEFT JOIN time t ON ef.time_id = t.id WHERE t.year = 2025 AND ef.management_code = 160085

question_pt: Qual é a média do valor pago em Abril de 2025?
question_en: What is the average amount paid in April 2025?
query: SELECT AVG(ef.paid_budget_value) FROM expense_fact ef LEFT JOIN time t ON ef.time_id = t.id WHERE t.year = 2025 AND t.month_number = 4

question_pt: Quais ações têm valor liquidado acima de 50000000?
question_en: Which actions have settled value above 50000000?
query: SELECT action_code FROM expense_fact WHERE settled_value > 50000000

question_pt: Qual é o total empenhado pela gestão 16097?
question_en: What is the total committed by management 16097?
query: SELECT SUM(committed_value) FROM expense_fact WHERE management_code = 16097

question_pt: Quais registros têm subfunção 'Educação Básica' em 2025?
question_en: Which records have subfunction 'Educação Básica' in 2025?
query: SELECT * FROM expense_fact ef LEFT JOIN subfunction sf ON ef.subfunction_code = sf.subfunction_code LEFT JOIN time t ON ef.time_id = t.id WHERE sf.subfunction_name LIKE '%Educação Básica%' AND t.year = 2025

question_pt: Qual foi o valor total empenhado por cada órgão?
question_en: What was the total committed amount by each agency?
query: SELECT a.agency_name, SUM(ef.committed_value) FROM expense_fact ef JOIN agency a ON ef.agency_code = a.agency_code GROUP BY a.agency_code

question_pt: Quais ações tiveram despesas liquidadas acima de 1 milhão?
question_en: Which actions had settled expenses above 1 million?
query: SELECT ac.action_name FROM expense_fact ef JOIN action ac ON ef.action_code = ac.action_code WHERE ef.settled_value > 1000000

question_pt: Qual órgão teve mais pagamentos no primeiro trimestre?
question_en: Which agency had the most payments in the first quarter?
query: SELECT a.agency_name, SUM(ef.paid_budget_value) FROM expense_fact ef LEFT JOIN agency a ON ef.agency_code = a.agency_code LEFT JOIN time t ON ef.time_id = t.id WHERE t.trimester_number = 1 GROUP BY a.agency_code ORDER BY SUM(ef.paid_budget_value) DESC LIMIT 1

question_pt: Liste os elementos de despesa com valores atualizados acima da média geral.
question_en: List expense elements with updated values above overall average.
query: SELECT e.element_name FROM expense_fact ef JOIN element e ON ef.element_code = e.element_code GROUP BY e.element_name HAVING AVG(ef.updated_budget_value ) > (SELECT AVG(updated_budget_value ) FROM expense_fact)

question_pt: Quais são os órgãos que realizaram despesas com 'material de consumo'?
question_en: Which agencies made expenses with 'material de consumo'?
query: SELECT DISTINCT a.agency_name FROM expense_fact ef JOIN agency a ON ef.agency_code = a.agency_code JOIN element e ON ef.element_code = e.element_code WHERE e.element_name LIKE '%material de consumo%'

question_pt: Qual a ação com maior valor de dotação inicial em 2025?
question_en: What is the action with the highest initial appropriation in 2025?
query: SELECT ac.action_name FROM expense_fact ef JOIN action ac ON ef.action_code = ac.action_code JOIN time t ON ef.time_id = t.id WHERE t.year = 2025 ORDER BY ef.initial_budget_value DESC LIMIT 1

question_pt: Quais elementos de despesa foram usados por mais de um órgão?
question_en: Which expense elements were used by more than one agency?
query: SELECT e.element_name FROM expense_fact ef JOIN element e ON ef.element_code = e.element_code GROUP BY e.element_name HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT ef.agency_code) > 1

question_pt: Liste os valores pagos por cada combinação de órgão e ação.
question_en: List payments for each agency-action combination.
query: SELECT a.agency_name, ac.action_name, SUM(ef.paid_budget_value) FROM expense_fact ef JOIN agency a ON ef.agency_code = a.agency_code JOIN action ac ON ef.action_code = ac.action_code GROUP BY a.agency_name, ac.action_name

question_pt: Qual foi o valor liquidado por mês para a ação "Gestão das atividades aéreas"?
question_en: What was the settled value per month for the action "Gestão das atividades aéreas"?
query: SELECT t.month_number, SUM(ef.settled_value) FROM expense_fact ef JOIN action ac ON ef.action_code = ac.action_code JOIN time t ON ef.time_id = t.id WHERE ac.action_name LIKE '%Gestão das atividades aéreas%' GROUP BY t.month_number

question_pt: Quais órgãos tiveram despesas em mais de 3 meses diferentes?
question_en: Which agencies had expenses in more than 3 different months?
query: SELECT a.agency_name FROM expense_fact ef JOIN agency a ON ef.agency_code = a.agency_code JOIN time t ON ef.time_id = t.id GROUP BY a.agency_name HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT t.month_number) > 3

question_pt: Qual o valor orçado por mes ?
question_en: What is the budgeted amount per month?
query: SELECT t.month, SUM(ef.initial_budget_value) AS budgeted_amount FROM expense_fact ef LEFT JOIN time t ON ef.time_id = t.id GROUP BY t.month

question_pt: Qual é o total empenhado pelo órgão 'Secretaria de Estado da Segurança Pública'?
question_en: What is the total committed by 'Secretaria de Estado da Segurança Pública'?
query: SELECT SUM(ef.committed_value) FROM expense_fact ef LEFT JOIN agency a ON ef.agency_code = a.agency_code WHERE a.agency_name LIKE '%Segurança Pública%'

question_pt: Quais são as despesas da função 'Educação'?
question_en: What are the expenses for the 'Educação' function?
query: SELECT * FROM expense_fact ef LEFT JOIN function f ON ef.function_code = f.function_code WHERE f.function_name LIKE '%Educação%'

question_pt: Quais despesas foram realizadas no mês de 4/Abril?
question_en: What expenses were made in April?
query: SELECT * FROM expense_fact ef LEFT JOIN time t ON ef.time_id = t.id WHERE t.month_number = 4
